ing.com","details":"Single verification","errors":{"AccessControlBadConfirmation()":[{"details":"The caller of a function is not the expected one. NOTE: Don't confuse with {AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount}."}],"AccessControlUnauthorizedAccount(address,bytes32)":[{"details":"The `account` is missing a role."}],"AddressEmptyCode(address)":[{"details":"There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract)."}],"ERC1967InvalidImplementation(address)":[{"details":"The `implementation` of the proxy is invalid."}],"ERC1967NonPayable()":[{"details":"An upgrade function sees `msg.value > 0` that may be lost."}],"EnforcedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is paused."}],"ExpectedPause()":[{"details":"The operation failed because the contract is not paused."}],"FailedCall()":[{"details":"A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted."}],"InvalidInitialization()":[{"details":"The contract is already initialized."}],"NotInitializing()":[{"details":"The contract is not initializing."}],"OwnableInvalidOwner(address)":[{"details":"The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)"}],"OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address)":[{"details":"The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation."}],"ReentrancyGuardReentrantCall()":[{"details":"Unauthorized reentrant call."}],"UUPSUnauthorizedCallContext()":[{"details":"The call is from an unauthorized context."}],"UUPSUnsupportedProxiableUUID(bytes32)":[{"details":"The storage `slot` is unsupported as a UUID."}]},"events":{"Initialized(uint64)":{"details":"Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized."},"Paused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is triggered by `account`."},"RoleAdminChanged(bytes32,bytes32,bytes32)":{"details":"Emitted when `newAdminRole` is set as ``role``'s admin role, replacing `previousAdminRole` `DEFAULT_ADMIN_ROLE` is the starting admin for all roles, despite {RoleAdminChanged} not being emitted signaling this."},"RoleGranted(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is granted `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call. This account bears the admin role (for the granted role). Expected in cases where the role was granted using the internal {AccessControl-_grantRole}."},"RoleRevoked(bytes32,address,address)":{"details":"Emitted when `account` is revoked `role`. `sender` is the account that originated the contract call:   - if using `revokeRole`, it is the admin role bearer   - if using `renounceRole`, it is the role bearer (i.e. `account`)"},"Unpaused(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the pause is lifted by `account`."},"Upgraded(address)":{"details":"Emitted when the implementation is upgraded."}},"kind":"dev","methods":{"activateLoan(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"}},"createLoan(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_amount":"Loan amount","_borrower":"Address of the borrower","_interestRate":"Interest rate for the loan","_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan","_repaymentRemainingMonths":"Number of months for repayment"}},"createLoanWithVerifiedDscr(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Uses the interest rate determined by verified DSCR calculation","params":{"_amount":"Loan amount","_borrower":"Address of the borrower","_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan (must match Cartesi proof)","_repaymentRemainingMonths":"Number of months for repayment"}},"createLoanWithZkFetchDscr(bytes32,address,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Uses the interest rate from the zkFetch verification","params":{"_amount":"Loan amount","_borrower":"Address of the borrower","_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan (must have zkFetch verified DSCR)","_repaymentRemainingMonths":"Number of months for repayment"}},"getBorrowerLatestVerifiedLoan(address)":{"params":{"_borrower":"Address of the borrower"},"returns":{"_0":"The latest loan ID with verified DSCR"}},"getLoanOutstanding(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"outstandingInterest":"The remaining interest","outstandingPrincipal":"The remaining principal"}},"getNextRepayment(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"_0":"The calculated repayment amount"}},"getRoleAdmin(bytes32)":{"details":"Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}."},"getVerifiedDscrResult(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"_0":"The verified DSCR result"}},"getZkFetchDscrResult(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"dscrValue":"The DSCR value (scaled by 1000)","interestRate":"The interest rate in basis points","proofHash":"The hash of the zkFetch proof","verifiedAt":"The timestamp of verification"}},"grantRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event."},"handleNotice(string,address,bytes)":{"details":"This is called by the relay service to process Cartesi outputs","params":{"borrower":"Address of the borrower","data":"Encoded notice data","noticeType":"Type of notice (dscr_verified_zkfetch)"}},"hasBorrowerTransactions(address)":{"params":{"_borrower":"Address of the borrower"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the borrower has verified transactions"}},"hasRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Returns `true` if `account` has been granted `role`."},"hasVerifiedDscr(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the loan has a verified DSCR calculation"}},"hasZkFetchVerifiedDscr(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the loan has a verified DSCR from zkFetch"}},"initialize(address,address[],address)":{"params":{"_owner":"Address of the contract owner","_token":"Address of the ERC20 token used for loans","approvers":"Array of initial approver addresses"}},"isBorrowerVerified(address)":{"params":{"_borrower":"Address of the borrower"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the borrower has verified identity"}},"isLoanDefaulted(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"},"returns":{"_0":"Whether the loan is in default status"}},"makePartialRepayment(bytes32,uint256)":{"details":"Interest is calculated proportionally based on the payment amount","params":{"_amount":"Total amount to pay (includes both principal and interest portions)","_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"}},"makeRepayment(bytes32)":{"params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"}},"markLoanDefaulted(bytes32)":{"details":"Only callable by pool manager or approver. Loan must be active and have outstanding balance.","params":{"_loanId":"Unique identifier for the loan"}},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"pause()":{"details":"Only callable by owner in case of emergency"},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"proxiableUUID()":{"details":"Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"renounceRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"revokeRole(bytes32,address)":{"details":"Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event."},"setProofVerifier(address)":{"params":{"_proofVerifier":"Address of the ProofVerifier contract"}},"setRelayService(address)":{"params":{"_relayService":"Address of the relay service"}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"transferFunds(address,uint256)":{"params":{"amount":"The amount of tokens to transfer","to":"The recipient address"},"returns":{"success":"Whether the transfer was successful"}},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). createLoanWithVerifiedDscr(bytes32,addre.details: Uses the interest rate determined by verified DSCR calculation

params._loanId: Unique identifier for the loan (must match Cartesi proof)

createLoanWithZkFetchDscr(bytes32,addres.details: Uses the interest rate from the zkFetch verification

params._loanId: Unique identifier for the loan (must have zkFetch verified DSCR)

returns._0: The latest loan ID with verified DSCR

getRoleAdmin(bytes32).details: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

returns.interestRate: The interest rate in basis points
returns.proofHash: The hash of the zkFetch proof

grantRole(bytes32,address).details: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleGranted} event.

handleNotice(string,address,bytes).details: This is called by the relay service to process Cartesi outputs

returns._0: Whether the borrower has verified transactions
Whether the loan has a verified DSCR calculation
Whether the loan has a verified DSCR from zkFetch

params._token: Address of the ERC20 token used for loans

returns._0: Whether the borrower has verified identity
Whether the loan is in default status

makePartialRepayment(bytes32,uint256).details: Interest is calculated proportionally based on the payment amount

params._amount: Total amount to pay (includes both principal and interest portions)

markLoanDefaulted(bytes32).details: Only callable by pool manager or approver. Loan must be active and have outstanding balance.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pause().details: Only callable by owner in case of emergency

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC-1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

renounceRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `callerConfirmation`. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

revokeRole(bytes32,address).details: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role. May emit a {RoleRevoked} event.

params.amount: The amount of tokens to transfer

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

unpause().details: Only callable by owner after emergency is resolved

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

activateLoan(bytes32).notice: Activates a created loan and transfers funds to borrower

createLoanWithVerifiedDscr(bytes32,addre.notice: Creates a loan using verified DSCR from Cartesi proofs

createLoanWithZkFetchDscr(bytes32,addres.notice: Creates a loan using zkFetch verified DSCR from Cartesi

getBorrowerLatestVerifiedLoan(address).notice: Gets the latest verified loan ID for a borrower

getLoanOutstanding(bytes32).notice: Gets the outstanding balance for a loan

getNextRepayment(bytes32).notice: Calculates the next repayment amount for a loan

getVerifiedDscrResult(bytes32).notice: Gets the verified DSCR result for a loan

getZkFetchDscrResult(bytes32).notice: Gets the zkFetch verified DSCR result for a loan

handleNotice(string,address,bytes).notice: Handles a notice from Cartesi (via relay service)

hasBorrowerTransactions(address).notice: Checks if a borrower has verified transaction data

hasVerifiedDscr(bytes32).notice: Checks if a loan has verified DSCR

hasZkFetchVerifiedDscr(bytes32).notice: Checks if a loan has verified DSCR via zkFetch

initialize(address,address[],address).notice: Initializes the contract with owner, approvers and token

isBorrowerVerified(address).notice: Checks if a borrower has verified identity

isLoanDefaulted(bytes32).notice: Checks if a loan has defaulted

makePartialRepayment(bytes32,uint256).notice: Allows a borrower to make a partial repayment on their loan

makeRepayment(bytes32).notice: Allows a borrower to make a full repayment on their loan

setProofVerifier(address).notice: Sets the proof verifier contract address

setRelayService(address).notice: Sets the relay service address that can submit Cartesi notices

transferFunds(address,uint256).notice: Transfers tokens from the pool to a specified address

updateLoanInterestRate(bytes32,uint256).notice: Updates the interest rate for an active loan

updateLoanRepaymentRemainingMonths(bytes.notice: Updates the remaining months for loan repayment
